product_name: Gerber Bear Grylls Folding Sheath Knife
long_description: The Gerber Bear Grylls Folding Sheath knife offers a serious blade in a foldable, compact design that fits neatly into a sheath and out of the way. Partially serrated blade is made of high carbon stainless-steel for excellent edge retention. Lock Back feature locks the blade securely in place when open. Ergonomically shaped, textured rubber handle maximizes comfort and grip. Rugged nylon sheath is light and mildew-resistant; sheath can be carried vertically or horizontally. The Gerber Bear Grylls Folding Sheath knife knife comes with the.
short_description: The Gerber Bear Grylls Folding Sheath knife offers a serious blade in a foldable, compact design that fits neatly into a sheath and out of the way.
